DOC.brief_summary: Although two kind selective estrogen receptor modulator ( SERM ) : raloxifene ( RLX ) bazedoxifene ( BZA ) , difference still unclear . In study , plan compare clinical efficacy safety RLX BZA .
DOC.detailed_description: Selective estrogen receptor modulator ( SERM ) important option postmenopausal osteoporosis . There two SERM approve Japan treatment postmenopausal osteoporosis woman increase risk fracture . One raloxifene ( RLX ) , bazedoxifene ( BZA ) . There report concern clinical efficacy safety data . In study , plan compare clinical efficacy safety RLX BZA . The main objective study reveal effect RLX BZA bone mineral density , bone turnover marker , bone quality marker .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman Patients could use SERM
